r.s: An extension to create PostScript files
r.d: ps is an extension similar to the pdf extension but for creating PostScript files. Its api is modelled after the pdf extension.
r.n: Made ps_arcn() available. ps_set_border_dash() checks now for 3 parameters instead of 4. Fixed segm fault when the optional parameter of ps_show_boxed() is not passed. Added some more examples. New function ps_include_file().
